enchantment.travelanchors.teleportation_: Increases the teleportation range with each tier
screen.travelanchors.nameless: Enter a name to use it
tooltip.travelanchors.travel_anchor_bloc: To teleport look at it while standing on another anchor or holding a Travel Staff
tooltip.travelanchors.travel_staff: Sneak + Right-Click to short range Teleport. Look at Travel Anchor to warp
travelanchors.lock.unlocked: This anchor is no longer locked
travelanchors.lock.interact: This anchor is locked. Shift right-click with empty hand to unlock
